stimulusHtml: The period of the oscillation for the object is most nearly

features.html: A 0.50 kg object is attached to a vertical spring of constant k, as shown above. The object is pulled down and released. The object oscillates vertically. If up is the positive direction, the position x of the object as a function of time t is given by the formula  x = β sin ( ω t + ϕ ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43A8@ , where β = 0.20 m, ω = 4.0 rad/s, and ϕ = π/3 rad.
